briefTitle: Health Care Disparities in Culturally Diverse, Special Needs & Disadvantaged Populations - Bridging the Gap
officialTitle: Health Care Disparities in Culturally Diverse, Special Needs & Disadvantaged Populations - Bridging the Gap
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Statistical comparisons of all collected demographic and clinical data
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age 18+
* diagnosis of advanced breast cancer within 6 months of study entry

* nil
